information: I'm a software engineer and cybersecurity professional with a background in mechanical and electrical engineering. I specialize in building secure, high-performance systems, from embedded applications and autonomous drones to full-stack software and DevOps pipelines. This site showcases my projects, skills, and experience across domains where precision, security, and innovation matter most.

I'm seeking opportunities where I can contribute to meaningful decision-making, solve complex problems, and collaborate with a driven team. Ideally in a role that values both impact and balance, allowing me to grow professionally while still having time to be present with my family.
To explore my work and background, use the navigation tabs on the top right. You can return to this overview anytime by selecting "My Portfolio" on the top left.

This website is built with Next.js, a React-based framework designed for fast, scalable web applications. To streamline updates across my professional materials, I also developed a Rust program that transforms structured JSON data into a polished resume, ensuring a single source of truth for both this site and my downloadable resume.

All content is driven by JSON files, making the site easy to maintain and extend as my experience evolves. I believe great engineering starts with clarity of data, design, and direction. This site reflects that principle in its structure and execution.
